quoteText:
Phoenix is hosted on Heroku for development purposes.
Please refer to their ToS for any more details.
title: ToS;DR refers users to Heroku's Terms of Service for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information
tosdr.tldr: Referring to its hosting service, ToS;DR's ToS state: "Phoenix is hosted on Heroku for development purposes. Please refer to their ToS for any more details."
